actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to eliminate the excise tax on local telephone service, toll telephone service, and teletypewriter exchange service, effective September 1, 1973.

summary.text: Eliminates the excise tax under the Internal Revenue Code on local telephone service, toll Telephone service, and teletype writer exchange services as of September 1, 1973.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to eliminate the excise tax on local telephone service, toll telephone service, and teletypewriter exchange service, effective September 1, 1973.
